title: Rust Blog Backend
author: admin
content:
# Rust Blog Backend

This blog is powered by Rust and Axum!

## Tech Stack

- **Backend**: Rust + Axum
- **Authentication**: Keycloak
- **Storage**: Markdown files
- **Frontend**: HTMX (coming soon)

## Code Example

```rust
fn main() {
    println!("Hello, Blog!");
}
```

Pretty awesome, right?
